contentrichtext.text: [[File:Map.Karasuyama-Town.Tochigi.PNG|thumb|Map of Karasuyama, Tochigi]] {{nihongo|'''Karasuyama'''|烏山町|Karasuyama-machi}} was a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Nasu District, Tochigi|Nasu District]], [[Tochigi Prefecture|Tochigi]], [[Japan]]. {{As of|2003}}, the town had an estimated [[population]] of 18,799 and a [[population density|density]] of 202.44 persons per km². The total area was 92.86 km². On October 1, 2005 Karasuyama was merged with the town of [[Minaminasu, Tochigi|Minaminasu]], also from [[Nasu District, Tochigi|Nasu District]], to form the new city of [[Nasukarasuyama, Tochigi|Nasukarasuyama]] and no longer exists as an independent municipality. ==External links== *[http://www.city.nasukarasuyama.lg.jp/ Nasukarasuyama official website] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Tochigi Prefecture]] {{Tochigi-geo-stub}}
